Entry.comments: No habilitda, se recomienda para servicios de actualizacion masiva

Entries.Entry: UPDATE MM4R6LIB.CVZSKU SET ZMSTYN = #ZMSTYN, ZMDESC = #ZMDESC, ZMSHOR = #ZMSHOR, ZMDEPT = #ZMDEPT, ZMCLAS = #ZMCLAS, ZMSCLS = #ZMSCLS, ZMUSER = #ZMUSER, ZMIRTL = #ZMIRTL, ZMHCST = #ZMHCST, ZMCOLA = #ZMCOLA, ZMSIZA = #ZMSIZA, ZMCOLV = #ZMCOLV, ZMSIZV = #ZMSIZV, ZMSTYN = #ZMSTYN, ZMVEND = #ZMVEND WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR

UPDATE MM4R6LIB.CVZSKU
SET ZMDEPT = #ZMDEPT, ZMSDPT = #ZMSDPT, ZMCLAS = #ZMCLAS, ZMSCLS = #ZMSCLS, ZMVEND = #ZMVEND, ZMCOLA = #ZMCOLA, ZMSIZA = #ZMSIZA, ZMHCST = #ZMHCST, ZMVCST = #ZMVCST, ZMIRTL = #ZMIRTL, ZMICST = #ZMICST, ZMATR1 = #ZMATR1, ZMSVND = #ZMSVND, ZMATR3 = #ZMATR3, ZMSTIK = #ZMSTIK, ZMEMPQ = #ZMEMPQ WHERE ZMSTYN = #ZMSTYN and ZMSEQ = #ZMSEQ and ZMSKU = 0
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IDESCR = #IDESCR, IDSCCD = #IDSCCD, ISORT = #ISORT, ASNUM = #ASNUM, IATRB5 = #IATRB5, IMOQTY = #IMOQTY WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IDEPT = #IDEPT, ISDEPT = #ISDEPT, ICLAS = #ICLAS, ISCLAS = #ISCLAS, BYRNUM = #BYRNUM WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IDEPT = #IDEPT, ISDEPT = #ISDEPT, ICLAS = #ICLAS, ISCLAS = #ISCLAS WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB1 = #IATRB1, IATRB2 = #IATRB2, IATRB3 = #IATRB3, IATRB4 = #IATRB4, ILBLTR = #ILBLTR WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB1 = #IATRB1 WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB2 = #IATRB2 WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB3 = #IATRB3 WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB4 = #IATRB4 WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET ILBLTR = #ILBLTR WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB1 = #IATRB1, IATRB2 = #IATRB2, IATRB3 = #IATRB3, IATRB4 = #IATRB4, ILBLTR = #ILBLTR WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB1 = #IATRB1 WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB2 = #IATRB2 WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB3 = #IATRB3 WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IATRB4 = #IATRB4 WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET ILBLTR = #ILBLTR WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET BYRNUM = #BYRNUM, MCHNUM = #MCHNUM, ISEASN = #ISEASN WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET ivndpn = #IVNDPN WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET ivndpn = '' WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR

UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET ISCOLR = #ISCOLR, ISSIZE = #ISSIZE
WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR
DELETE FROM MM4R6LIB.INVUPC WHERE IUPC = #IUPC

Entry.comments: SSTYLE=nombre de estilo, SDSCCD=estado, SSORT=nombre corto, SASNUM,SPVNDR=Proveedor

Entries.Entry: UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SSTYLE = #SSTYLE, SDSCCD = #SDSCCD, SSORT = #SSORT, SASNUM = #SASNUM, SPVNDR = #SPVNDR WHERE SSTYLQ = #SNUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SDEPT = #SDEPT, SSDEPT = #SSDEPT, SCLAS = #SCLAS, SSCLAS = #SSCLAS, SBUYER = #SBUYER WHERE SSTYLQ = #SSTYLQ
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SATRB1 = #SATRB1, SATRB2 = #SATRB2, SATRB3 = #SATRB3, SATRB4 = #SATRB4 WHERE SSTYLQ = #SNUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SATRB1 = #SATRB1 WHERE SSTYLQ = #SNUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SATRB2 = #SATRB2 WHERE SSTYLQ = #SNUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SATRB3 = #SATRB3 WHERE SSTYLQ = #SNUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SATRB4 = #SATRB4 WHERE SSTYLQ = #SNUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SBUYER = #SBUYER, SSEASN = #SSEASN WHERE SSTYLQ = #SNUMBR
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVDSC SET POS12 = #POS12, POS15 = #POS15, POS21 = #POS21, DSC20 = #DSC20, DSC35 = #DSC35, DSC151 = #DSC151, DSC152 = #DSC152, POS18 = #POS18 WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN
UPDATE mm4r6lib.mstita SET ITAVAL = #ITAVAL WHERE INUMBR = #INUMBR AND ITANAM = 'STICKQ'
UPDATE mm4r6lib.mstita SET ITAVAL = #ITAVAL WHERE ISTYLN = #ISTYLN AND ITANAM = 'STICKQ'
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INSMST SET SDSCCD = #STATUS WHERE SSTYLQ = #ID
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IDSCCD = #STATUS WHERE ISTYLN = #ID
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.INVMST SET IDSCCD = #STATUS WHERE INUMBR = #ID
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.APSUPP SET ASNAME = #ASNAME WHERE ASNUM = #ASNUM

UPDATE MM4R6LIB.APADDR SET AATYPE = #AATYPE, AANAME = #AANAME, AAADD1 = #AAADD1, AAADD2 = #AAADD2, AAADD3 = #AAADD3, AACITY = #AACITY, AASTAT = #AASTAT, AAPSCD = #AAPSCD, AAPHON = #AAPHON, AAFAXN = #AAFAXN, AATELX = #AATELX, AACONT = #AACONT, AAHOME = #AAHOME, AAEMAL = #AAEMAL, AAWADD = #AAWADD WHERE AANUM = #AANUM

UPDATE MM4R6LIB.TBLSTR SET STRNAM = #STRNAM, STADD1 = #STADD1, STADD2 = #STADD2, STCITY = #STCITY, STPVST = #STPVST, STCNTY = #STCNTY, STCTRY = #STCTRY, STZIP = #STZIP, STPHON = #STPHON, STFAXN = #STFAXN, STSHRT = #STSHRT, STMNGR = #STMNGR, STSDAT = #STSDAT, STRETL = #STRETL, STRWHS = #STRWHS, STRDST = #STRDST, STRTYP = #STRTYP, STCLDT = #STCLDT, STRCOD = #STRCOD, STRLAN = #STRLAN, STADD3 = #STADD3 WHERE STRNUM = #STRNUM
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.TBLCOL SET COLDSC = #COLDSC, COLSHT = #COLSHT WHERE COLCOD = #COLCOD
UPDATE MM4R6LIB.tblsiz SET SIZDSC = #SIZDSC, SIZSHT = #SIZSHT WHERE SIZCOD = #SIZCOD
DELETE MM4R6LIB.ECOSTOEST
